alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 03 at 4:00AM EST until January 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers... Ohio River at Portsmouth. Ohio River at Maysville. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ohio River at Portsmouth. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 49.0 feet, Lowland flooding affects southern Scioto County. Backwater flooding begins into the Scioto River, as well as along smaller creeks and streams. State Route 73 is closed near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 42.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 48.6 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Action stage is 35.0 feet. - Flood stage is 50.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
